mapper.select: SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', c.fUserID AS 'userID', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson', o.fOrganizationName AS 'organizationName', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fSearchEngine AS 'searchEngine', qs.fBearPawNumber AS 'bearPawNumber', qs.fType AS 'type', qs.fIsMonitor AS 'fIsMonitor', qs.fIsReady AS 'fIsReady', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qs.fStatus AS 'status', qs.fRenewalStatus AS 'renewalStatus', qs.fCrawlerStatus AS 'crawlerStatus', qs.fAutoCrawlKeywordFlag AS 'autoCrawlKeywordFlag' FROM t_qz_setting qs JOIN t_customer c ON qs.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.fLoginName = c.fUserID LEFT JOIN t_organization o ON o.fUuid = u.fOrganizationID ORDER BY qs.fUpdateTime
